pr_title: (0.22.0) Allow building of aarch64 for all current releases

timeline.message:
Allow building of aarch64 for all current releases

[ci skip]

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

Allow building of aarch64 for all current releases

[ci skip]

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.author: keithc-ca
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -40,10 +40,10 @@
  *              win_x86-64_cmprssptrs,
  *              win_x86 (Java 8 support only),
  *              zos_390-64_cmprssptrs (Java 11 support only),
- *              osx_x86-64 (Java 8 and Java 11 support only),
- *              osx_x86-64_cmprssptrs (Java 8 and Java 11 support only),
- *              aarch64_linux (Java 8 and Java 11 support only),
- *              aarch64_linux_xl (Java 8 and Java 11 support only)
+ *              osx_x86-64,
+ *              osx_x86-64_cmprssptrs,

replies.bodyText: See if you like the latest change, and then I'll change the other PR to match.
replies.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: Made another change, pls review again.
replies.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: @AdamBrousseau I'm still not sure if this is correct, can you pls review.
replies.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: @keithc-ca Adam isn't available to review in the short term. Are you ok to merge as-is, and we can make any further corrections later? I'd like to run a jdk15 aarch64 build which is blocked by getting this merged, and this has already been delayed from yesterday.
replies.author: pshipton
